title: 217 - Finding Your Style, Tricks for Getting Stuff Done, Imposter Syndrome & MORE
description:
This episode covers a grab bag of topics with lots of tactics, fresh ideas and new perspectives designed to get you jazzed about making stuff today!

I hope most of these topics will hit you in the sweet spot, but I bet one or two of these will be exactly what you need to hear today.

Some topics we cover in this episode:

  • Finding Your Style

  • Managing productivity and or ADHD

  • Battling Imposter Syndrome even after success!

  • Pricing

  • Synesthesia!

  • Zelda soundtracks!

  • AND MORE!

Submit questions for Ask Dr. Pizza episodes by emailing your written or recorded question to andy@andy-j-miller.com - Please state whether you'd like to remain anonymous or featured with a shout out to your work / social links.

Conferences

Dreamtopia Workshop with Cathy Heller & Friends in L.A.
PROMO CODE: ANDY for 30% OFF
SIGN UP NOW! bit.ly/andydreamtopia

Creative Works Skill Camp
PROMO CODE: CPT50 for $50 off
https://www.creativeworks.co/skillcamp/

SHOW NOTES
Philosophize This! Gilles Deleuze
http://philosophizethis.org/deleuze-pt-1/

Bain & Company Elements of Value
https://www.bain.com/insights/topics/elements-of-value/

SUSAN CAIN - TIM FERRISS Interview
https://tim.blog/2019/01/24/susan-cain/

JOSH KAUFMAN PERSONAL MBA
https://personalmba.com/core-human-drives/

CREDITS

Support Creative Pep Talk on Patreon: www.patreon.com/creativepeptalk

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com
